headline: Has Amphenol’s Recent 88.2% Surge Left Limited Upside For Investors In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Amphenol’s huge run has left the stock overvalued or if there is still smart upside left on the table, you are in the right place. Even after a sharp 88.2% gain year to date and a 74.1% rise over the last year, the share price has cooled recently, with the stock down 7.3% over the past week and 2.9% over the last month. Much of this swing reflects shifting sentiment around high quality tech hardware names as investors rotate between growth and quality, alongside...
